fillingListOfOneRow(Map<Coordinates, Card>, int, Coordinates, boolean) - Method in class fr.utt.lo02.projet.model.board.visitor.ScoreCalculatorVisitor
This method build a filling List from Cards of a row or a column of the board.
FIRST_CHOICE - fr.utt.lo02.projet.model.game.ChoiceOrder
Corresponds to the first choice which a player can do.
FIRST_CHOICE - fr.utt.lo02.projet.model.game.GameState
Current player has to make his first choice.
FIRST_TURN - fr.utt.lo02.projet.model.game.GameState
It's the first turn of the round.
font - Static variable in class fr.utt.lo02.projet.view.hmi.InitFrameView
Font used for the initialization menu and the game.
font - Static variable in class fr.utt.lo02.projet.view.hmi.SwingHmiView
The font used to draw the texts
FONT_PATH - Static variable in class fr.utt.lo02.projet.view.hmi.AddFont
 
fourteenCardBoardHorizontal() - Method in class fr.utt.lo02.projet.junit.DifficultStrategyTest
 
fourteenCardBoardVertical() - Method in class fr.utt.lo02.projet.junit.DifficultStrategyTest
 
fr.utt.lo02.projet.controller - package fr.utt.lo02.projet.controller
Controllers for the MVC pattern (Main menu and Game) The controller are following the model state machine.
fr.utt.lo02.projet.junit - package fr.utt.lo02.projet.junit
 
fr.utt.lo02.projet.model - package fr.utt.lo02.projet.model
Model of the game Model are here seen as API with states, to match the MVC pattern a controller changes the state of a model which leads to an update of the views (Model are observable and View are observers).
fr.utt.lo02.projet.model.board - package fr.utt.lo02.projet.model.board
Board implementations with Card and coordinates This package contains every Board, and the Card, the Coordinates and the different enums of cards.
fr.utt.lo02.projet.model.board.visitor - package fr.utt.lo02.projet.model.board.visitor
fr.utt.lo02.projet.board.visitor is containing the interface IBoardVisitor and its implementations.
fr.utt.lo02.projet.model.game - package fr.utt.lo02.projet.model.game
Game variants and action results enums In this package we can find every Shape Up game implementation Including: ShapeUpGame, ShapeUpGameAdvanced and ShapeUpGameWithoutAdjacencyRule Those are representing the game with different role as an model seen as a kind of API.
fr.utt.lo02.projet.model.player - package fr.utt.lo02.projet.model.player
Real and virtual players with their requests A Virtual player is a player following a strategy to do his choices.
fr.utt.lo02.projet.model.strategy - package fr.utt.lo02.projet.model.strategy
Implementation of the strategy pattern used for the virtual player actions Each virtual player has a strategy which determines his "difficulty level" The random strategy is considered easy, all of his actions are randomly calculated.
fr.utt.lo02.projet.view - package fr.utt.lo02.projet.view
Views of the game using MVC pattern In the pattern, the model notifies a state change to the views (using the Observer pattern) Then the user acts on the view.
fr.utt.lo02.projet.view.console - package fr.utt.lo02.projet.view.console
Every console view code is gathered here for the MVC Views of the menu and game GameConsoleView and InitConsoleView are the 2 views for the Game and Menu set up.
fr.utt.lo02.projet.view.hmi - package fr.utt.lo02.projet.view.hmi
Every Swing and AWT related code is gathered here for the MVC Views of the menu and game SwingHmiView and InitFrameView are here the main classes that extends JPanel and implements the views interface The other are utilities (CoordinatesConvertor, AddFont...) or part of panel (EndGameScoreDrawer, EndRoundScoreDrawer)
frame - Variable in class fr.utt.lo02.projet.controller.InitController
The frame used for the game
